t: Differentiation or Salience
s: Brand A being 'salient' to more people than B is then usually also linked with whether A has, if anything, wider distribution, more shelf-space and display, more sales-people, more promotions, more word-of-mouth, more media mentions, more advertising and probably bigger absolute profits.
